price: Ẹ máa jẹ, ẹ máa mu ní gbẹdẹmukẹ nítorí ohun tí ẹ̀ ń ṣe níṣẹ́.
arabic: كُلُواْ وَٱشۡرَبُواْ هَنِيٓـَٔۢا بِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: kulū wa-ish'rabū hanīan bimā kuntum taʿmalūna
